wikipedia_page.main: David W. Potter (born 29 August 1948) is a Scottish sports writer who has published more than fifty books, primarily on Scottish football and cricket.

response: Gallagher resided in Bishopbriggs with his wife Maryrose.  Together, they had three children: Paul, Kieron, and Claire.  His biography Charlie Gallagher? What A Player, authored by David W. Potter, was released in 2016.
In October 2013, a biography "Sunny Jim Young - Celtic Legend" written by David W. Potter was published.
* David W. Potter (born 1948), Scottish sports writer
